about_the_game:
Thanks for supporting us in making games!

The game will always be free! This DLC is an optional extra for supporters of our games as a token of appreciation.

This DLC unlocks a new option in the settings menu where you can;
- change the background image of the level select screen.
- change the appearance of the player into a raptor or a mech.

This DLC will not add more levels, story or gameplay.

We hope to deliver more stories in the future. Your donation will make that possible!
detailed_description:
Thanks for supporting us in making games!

The game will always be free! This DLC is an optional extra for supporters of our games as a token of appreciation.

This DLC unlocks a new option in the settings menu where you can;
- change the background image of the level select screen.
- change the appearance of the player into a raptor or a mech.

This DLC will not add more levels, story or gameplay.

We hope to deliver more stories in the future. Your donation will make that possible!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04.2 LTS
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-3632QM CPU @ 2.20GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 7500M/7600M Series
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Tested on a laptop with these specs

name: Unforgettable You - Supporter Bonus DLC

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Unforgettable You - Supporter Bonus DLC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8300H @ 2.30GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 530 (Skylake GT2)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Compatible windows sound card

short_description: This DLC unlocks a new option in the settings menu where you can change the appearance of the player and choose a different background image.
